materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a narrow river taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor), Indonesia. The river is in the middle of steep hills on either side. On the left side of the river, there is a small waterfall. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java View from the bridge over the Railway Station, Buitenzorg, Java
